posts.post_content:
I bought this card as a PSA 3, but cracked it out to send to SGC.  However, I never got around to doing it.  You are buying the card RAW, the pics are only to show that it was a PSA 3.  Price is $60 delivered.  

[IMG]http://i185.photobucket.com/albums/x137/vintagetoppsguy/For%20Sale/GeyerFront.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i185.photobucket.com/albums/x137/vintagetoppsguy/For%20Sale/GeyerBack.jpg[/IMG]

I'll take it if still available.

Adam
